mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mba_batch_files(is_deleted, file_name, file_path, file_periods, status, cal_date, create_time, update_time) select '0', #{fileName}, #{filePath}, IFNULL( MAX( file_periods ), 0 )+ 1, '0', DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'), now(), now() from mba_batch_files where file_name like #{type}
mapper.update: update mba_batch_files set status = #{status}, description = #{description} where file_name = #{fileName}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `mba_batch_files` WHERE file_name LIKE concat('%',#{fileName},'%') and `status` = #{status} ORDER BY file_periods LIMIT 1
